Quarter.description: Calendar quarter of the flight date (1 = Jan-Mar, 2 = Apr-Jun, 3 = Jul-Sep, 4 = Oct-Dec).

DayOfMonth.description: Day of the month of the flight date (1-31).

DayOfWeek.description: Day of the week of the flight date

AirlineName.description: Full name of the operating airline.

OriginAirport.description: IATA code of the departure (origin) airport.

OriginState.description: US state or country code of the departure airport.

DestinationAirport.description: IATA code of the arrival (destination) airport.

DestinationState.description: US state of the arrival airport.

ScheduledDepartureTime.description: Scheduled local departure time of the flight (HHMM, 24-hour clock).

ScheduledArrivalTime.description: Scheduled local arrival time of the flight (HHMM, 24-hour clock).

ScheduledElapsedTime.description: Planned gate-to-gate flight duration in minutes.

DepartureTemperature.description: Temperature (Celsius) at the departure airport at the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalTemperature.description: Temperature (Celsius) at the arrival airport at the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureDewPoint.description: Dew point temperature (Celsius) at the departure airport at the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalDewPoint.description: Dew point temperature (Celsius) at the arrival airport at the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureHumidity.description: Relative humidity (%) at the departure airport at the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalHumidity.description: Relative humidity (%) at the arrival airport at the scheduled arrival time.

DeparturePrecipitation.description: Precipitation amount (mm) at the departure airport at the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalPrecipitation.description: Precipitation amount (mm) at the arrival airport at the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureWindSpeed.description: Wind speed (m/s) at the departure airport at the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalWindSpeed.description: Wind speed (m/s) at the arrival airport at the scheduled arrival time.

DeparturePressure.description: Sea-level atmospheric pressure (hPa) at the departure airport at the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalPressure.description: Sea-level atmospheric pressure (hPa) at the arrival airport at the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureWeatherCondition.description: Categorical weather condition (e.g., Clear, Rain, Snow) at the departure airport at the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalWeatherCondition.description: Categorical weather condition (e.g., Clear, Rain, Snow) at the arrival airport at the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureExtremeWeather.description: Indicator that extreme weather advisories (e.g., thunderstorms, blizzards) were in effect at the departure airport at the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalExtremeWeather.description: Indicator that extreme weather advisories (e.g., thunderstorms, blizzards) were in effect at the arrival airport at the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureTemperatureLag1.description: Temperature (Celsius) at the departure airport 1 hour before the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalTemperatureLag1.description: Temperature (Celsius) at the arrival airport 1 hour before the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureTemperatureLead1.description: Temperature (Celsius) at the departure airport 1 hour after the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalTemperatureLead1.description: Temperature (Celsius) at the arrival airport 1 hour after the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureTemperatureLag2.description: Temperature (Celsius) at the departure airport 2 hours before the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalTemperatureLag2.description: Temperature (Celsius) at the arrival airport 2 hours before the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureTemperatureLead2.description: Temperature (Celsius) at the departure airport 2 hours after the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalTemperatureLead2.description: Temperature (Celsius) at the arrival airport 2 hours after the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureDewPointLag1.description: Dew point temperature (Celsius) at the departure airport 1 hour before the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalDewPointLag1.description: Dew point temperature (Celsius) at the arrival airport 1 hour before the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureDewPointLead1.description: Dew point temperature (Celsius) at the departure airport 1 hour after the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalDewPointLead1.description: Dew point temperature (Celsius) at the arrival airport 1 hour after the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureDewPointLag2.description: Dew point temperature (Celsius) at the departure airport 2 hours before the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalDewPointLag2.description: Dew point temperature (Celsius) at the arrival airport 2 hours before the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureDewPointLead2.description: Dew point temperature (Celsius) at the departure airport 2 hours after the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalDewPointLead2.description: Dew point temperature (Celsius) at the arrival airport 2 hours after the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureHumidityLag1.description: Relative humidity (%) at the departure airport 1 hour before the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalHumidityLag1.description: Relative humidity (%) at the arrival airport 1 hour before the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureHumidityLead1.description: Relative humidity (%) at the departure airport 1 hour after the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalHumidityLead1.description: Relative humidity (%) at the arrival airport 1 hour after the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureHumidityLag2.description: Relative humidity (%) at the departure airport 2 hours before the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalHumidityLag2.description: Relative humidity (%) at the arrival airport 2 hours before the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureHumidityLead2.description: Relative humidity (%) at the departure airport 2 hours after the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalHumidityLead2.description: Relative humidity (%) at the arrival airport 2 hours after the scheduled arrival time.

DeparturePrecipitationLag1.description: Precipitation amount (mm) at the departure airport 1 hour before the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalPrecipitationLag1.description: Precipitation amount (mm) at the arrival airport 1 hour before the scheduled arrival time.

DeparturePrecipitationLead1.description: Precipitation amount (mm) at the departure airport 1 hour after the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalPrecipitationLead1.description: Precipitation amount (mm) at the arrival airport 1 hour after the scheduled arrival time.

DeparturePrecipitationLag2.description: Precipitation amount (mm) at the departure airport 2 hours before the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalPrecipitationLag2.description: Precipitation amount (mm) at the arrival airport 2 hours before the scheduled arrival time.

DeparturePrecipitationLead2.description: Precipitation amount (mm) at the departure airport 2 hours after the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalPrecipitationLead2.description: Precipitation amount (mm) at the arrival airport 2 hours after the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureWindSpeedLag1.description: Wind speed (m/s) at the departure airport 1 hour before the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalWindSpeedLag1.description: Wind speed (m/s) at the arrival airport 1 hour before the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureWindSpeedLead1.description: Wind speed (m/s) at the departure airport 1 hour after the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalWindSpeedLead1.description: Wind speed (m/s) at the arrival airport 1 hour after the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureWindSpeedLag2.description: Wind speed (m/s) at the departure airport 2 hours before the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalWindSpeedLag2.description: Wind speed (m/s) at the arrival airport 2 hours before the scheduled arrival time.

DepartureWindSpeedLead2.description: Wind speed (m/s) at the departure airport 2 hours after the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalWindSpeedLead2.description: Wind speed (m/s) at the arrival airport 2 hours after the scheduled arrival time.

DeparturePressureLag1.description: Sea-level atmospheric pressure (hPa) at the departure airport 1 hour before the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalPressureLag1.description: Sea-level atmospheric pressure (hPa) at the arrival airport 1 hour before the scheduled arrival time.

DeparturePressureLead1.description: Sea-level atmospheric pressure (hPa) at the departure airport 1 hour after the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalPressureLead1.description: Sea-level atmospheric pressure (hPa) at the arrival airport 1 hour after the scheduled arrival time.

DeparturePressureLag2.description: Sea-level atmospheric pressure (hPa) at the departure airport 2 hours before the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalPressureLag2.description: Sea-level atmospheric pressure (hPa) at the arrival airport 2 hours before the scheduled arrival time.

DeparturePressureLead2.description: Sea-level atmospheric pressure (hPa) at the departure airport 2 hours after the scheduled departure time.

ArrivalPressureLead2.description: Sea-level atmospheric pressure (hPa) at the arrival airport 2 hours after the scheduled arrival time.
